# Auditability and Defensibility Review

## Decision Recording Overview
Describe how AI-influenced decisions are currently documented.

---

## Post-Incident Reconstruction Feasibility
Evaluate whether decisions can be reconstructed after an incident.

---

## Accountability Exposure
Explain who is accountable when decisions cannot be fully explained.

---

## Governance and Audit Risk
Assess organizational risk created by non-auditable decisions.

---

## Auditability Decision
State clearly whether continued AI influence is acceptable or not.
